abstract: A report released this month by the United Nations Environment Program and the Environmental Law Institute says that existing international climate laws are insufficient.
snippet: A report released this month by the United Nations Environment Program and the Environmental Law Institute says that existing international climate laws are insufficient.
lead_paragraph: A report released this month by the United Nations Environment Program and the Environmental Law Institute calls for stronger international laws to protect the environment during times of war.

headline.main: U.N. Report Calls for More Environmental Protection in Wartime
